subject: Re: It gets weird form here!
author: Jon Maronge
full_text:
yes... but it wasn't john.. it is jon. It was really weird making that 
call. I thought that i would get hung up on. I have been experimenting 
with a hack 470 that i recieved from laura kimberly on friday.

This has been a weird trip. Still don't know what to think about it 
all..lol

I am looking forward to more experimenting now. I was skeptical about 
it until a few nights ago.

-- Jon
